channel.title: How do i stop people killing in safezones in pimpscape!?
channel.description:
PLEASE SOMEONE!
How do i stop it so no1 can attack people in the dummy room in varrock, it's ment to be a safe zone and i've made the X and Y cords over again to see if it would work
But people keep ancienting people in the safe zone!
PLEASE HELP ME! PLEASE!!!!!!

If someone could be so nice and code me the cords i will gladly +rep them! please i’m up too my knee’s in stuff so please, could ya?

item.title: How do i stop people killing in safezones in pimpscape!?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“Zenzie, post:3, topic:84695”]LOL your dumb …

public boolean nonwild[/quote]
first i sure hope you werent talking to me because il come to your house and eat your eyeballs out of their sockets then burn you alive -.-

[quote=“she bitch, post:4, topic:84695”]Hm thats strange… i cant seem to find it or see it

Here’s what i got…

[code]case 249: //Magic on Players
// MAGE_00
int playerIndexx = inStream.readSignedWordA();
spellID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();

client pl2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx];
if(pl2 == null) return;

int pcombat = -1;

if(server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx] != null)
pcombat = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].combat;

ResetAttackNPC();

MageAttackIndex = playerIndexx+1;
if(Mage(playerIndexx)) {
AttackMage(playerIndexx);
mageTimer = 20;
}
else {
stillgfx(339, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absY, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absX);
}
if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) {
if(mageTimer <= 0) {
AttackMage(playerIndexx);
mageTimer = 20;
}
}
else {
sendMessage(“This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked”);
}[/code][/quote]
And i forgot your using pimpscape, idk much about it, that isnt all the class, classes end wit ha break; and i guess my if thing would still work, jsut put the

if (absY > # && absY < # && absX > # && absX < #)(

right after the case 249: //Magic on Players line, and the

} else {
sendMessage("Cannot mage here");
}

right before that cases break, and it should work…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i stop people killing in safezones in pimpscape!?

item.title: How do i stop people killing in safezones in pimpscape!?
item.dc:creator: @she_bitch she bitch
item.description:
@she_bitch wrote:

Hm thats strange… i cant seem to find it or see it

Here’s what i got…

[code]case 249: //Magic on Players
// MAGE_00
int playerIndexx = inStream.readSignedWordA();
spellID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();

client pl2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx];
if(pl2 == null) return;

int pcombat = -1;

if(server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx] != null)
pcombat = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].combat;

ResetAttackNPC();

MageAttackIndex = playerIndexx+1;
if(Mage(playerIndexx)) {
AttackMage(playerIndexx);
mageTimer = 20;
}
else {
stillgfx(339, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absY, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absX);
}
if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) {
if(mageTimer <= 0) {
AttackMage(playerIndexx);
mageTimer = 20;
}
}
else {
sendMessage(“This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked”);
}[/code]

Read full topic
